Númenórean]] royal: [ˈardamir]}}, stem ''Ardamír-'') was the second child and first son of [[Axantur]], a nobleman of [[Númenor]]. His great-nephew [[Hallacar]] would marry [[Tar-Ancalimë]], the first [[Ruling Queen of Númenor]]. Though he left descendants, nothing of their lives was recorded.<ref>{{UT

{{disambig-two: His name means "Jewel of [[Arda]]" in [[Quenya]] (from ''-[[mir]]'' = "jewel"); it was the mother-name of [[Eärendil]] son of [[Idril]] and [[Tuor]].
